name: Sweets/Desserts
description: All of the places that exclusively serve sweets or have a significant dessert offering.

rankSlots.title: Fantastic: First Choice
rankSlots.description: Exceptional. Places that are worth traveling to. Would highly recommend to friends and family.

rankSlots.title: Great
rankSlots.description: Places that are fantastic if you are in the area, but are otherwise not particularly exceptional.

rankSlots.title: Fine
rankSlots.description: Food is average or decent but not worth the price. May or may not be worth a visit.

rankSlots.title: Visited
rankSlots.description: Have eaten at before, but would definitely not recommend.
